title: Champions In the Collection Tab with the pre-reworked abilities
body:
just checked all the re-worked champs in the new alpha client :
- All of Rengar's are his pre-rework abilites
- Twitch's Q doesn't show the new camo in play
- LeBlanc's Abilities haven't changed
- Talon's haven't been changed
- Katarina's haven't been changed 

Just thought it would be handy to know :)

EDIT 1 : The videos that are played when click on the abilities, sorry i didnt state that before
